Comment.val: /* Program to collect all reservations for a Client Product Id (PPR_ID). The reservation amounts are converted to amounts in report currency to be used during the spending limit. calculations. */
/* The Report Currency of the client for whom the spending limit is calculated */

Text.val: Determine the reservations with its amounts and currencies to calculate the amounts

SQL_STMT_U.val: select * from (select r.id, t.sl_reservation_post, c.currency, c.account_currency, sum(c.amount) reservation_total from reservations r, reservation_components c, reservation_types t where r.ppr_id = ~1 and r.id = c.res_id and r.type = t.id group by r.id, t.sl_reservation_post, c.currency, c.account_currency) where reservation_total <> 0

Text.val: When Multi Currency is active for the prodduct, then write the Foreign Currency so at least the currency can be selected
When amount currency and report currency are the same --> no conversion
When amount currency and report currency differ --> conversion of the amount
For the RepCurrency there is no bank/market price (is EUR for 99.9999% of the time)
When account currency and report currency are the same --> set as same amount
When amount currency and account currency are the same --> no conversion
When amount currency and account currency differ --> conversion of the amount
